recommendations.name: Seito Masamune Tantanmen Tsujita
recommendations.area: Multiple locations (Ogawamachi, Kojimachi, Ichigaya, and more)
recommendations.description: Key's personal favorite. Authentic Chengdu-style tantanmen by Tsujita (of tsukemen fame) â€” 18 locations across Japan. Rich sesame broth with customizable spice levels (Key goes level 3). Counter seating at most spots.
